casebody.data:
Monday, July 27, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

98-904. State v. Herring.

Mahoning App. No. 96CR339. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Mahoning County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for extension of time for transmission of record,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for extension of time for transmission of record be, and hereby is, granted, and the time for transmitting record is extended until September 8, 1998.
